title: Her Hero
description: She needed a hero…Navajo healer Joshua Blackhorse was the one man who could help Nydia Jim keep a promise to her son—and save a life. She'd come to Four Winds in search of Joshua—and became the sole witness to his innocence as he stood accused of a terrible crime.She found a man…All his life Joshua had followed the old ways of his people—tolerance, balance and moderation. Now, deserted by his friends, he had to rely on Nydia. But when he looked into her dark eyes, what he felt had nothing to do with moderation. Was Nydia a dangerous temptation…or his only hope?
author: Aimée Thurlo
